actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-466.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 240 - 134 (Record Vote No: 10).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H. R. 4055) to assist the States to establish and operate protection and advocacy systems for mentally ill individuals and to promote family support groups for Alzheimer's disease patients and their families.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4055 (advocacy systems for mentally ill and family support groups for Alzheimer's disease patients and families).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H. R. 4055) to assist the States to establish and operate protection and advocacy systems for mentally ill individuals and to promote family support groups for Alzheimer's disease patients and their families.
